commonInfo.para: This BREX data module gives the rules (chapterized) that applied to the N219.

snsSystem.snsTitle: Parking, mooring, storing, and return to service

snsSubSystem.snsTitle: Audio integrating and voice command systems
Support of airplane for repair and alignment check procedures
Leading edge and leading edge devices
Trailing edge and trailing edge devices

structureObjectRule.objectUse: Those of attribute are not allowed to have letter I and O inside the value.
structureObjectRule.objectValue: the matched pattern is not allowed

structureObjectRule.objectUse: The XPath result shall be true.
The XPath result should be true. The attribute caveats must not be used in data module.
The XPath result shall be true.
The XPath result shall be true. Element <internalRef> and <dmRef> and <pmRef> are not allowed.
The XPath result shall be true. attribute vitalWarningFlag and warningType is not allowed.
The XPath result shall be true. attribute cautionType is not allowed.
The XPath result shall be true. attribute noteType is not allowed.
The XPath result shall be 'not match'. Element <reasonForUpdate> is not allowed during production proccess (@inwork != 00).
The XPath result shall be 'not match'. Element <title> is not allowed.
If the XPath result is 'match', the value shall be in accordance with valueAllowed.
The XPath result shall be 'match'. Attribute <securityClassification> shall be followed the valueAllowed.
The XPath result shall be as match as the valueAllowed pattern.

nonContextRule.simplePara: Each of data module shall use S1000D issue 5.0. Check that every single schema used comes from http://www.s1000d.org/S1000D_5-0/xml_schema_flat/
Each of data module shall use OxFord Dictionary.
The prefix words is attached in stylesheet (XSLT) file.
The information of the items that are identified as general/special/support tools or equipment shall be included in element reqSupportEquips¢ and its child elements..
Make sure each "internal references" is same with "preliminary requirements".
The OEM renamed part numbers can be used instead of part numbers allocated by the part design authority.
